title: SRS Audio Sandbox 1.9.0.4 with USB Soundcard Support
description:
SRS Audio Sandbox 1.9.0.4 with Driver 1.6.6.0 & USB Soundcard Support
---------------------------------------------------------------------
- full version (readme.txt for instructions)
- this is the ONLY version that has USB SOUNDCARD SUPPORT (personally tested & working with my Creative Audigy 2 NX USB Soundcard)

This SRS Audio Sandbox is better than SRS HD Audio Lab or SRS Audio Essentials because:
1) The audio driver provides volume control for all 5.1 Channels, therefore master volume controls the volume of all channels.
2) The audio processing methods are the same as SRS HD Audio Lab, which is way better than SRS Audio Essentials (this last one has a very bad normalizer).
3) Can switch very easy between soundcards, as you just need to restart the playback (very often, SRS HD Audio Lab and SRS Audio Essentials won't work again until you restart the computer, which is very annoying).
4) It has USB Soundcard Support (only the 1.9.0.4 version with 1.6.6.0 driver), which makes SRS HD Audio Lab and SRS AUdio Essentials pure history
